Room.Name: Thieve's Guild
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the local chapters of the Oceancrest Thieve's Guild.
Room.LongDescription: There are three doors here, each painted a different color. If you are level 3 and wish to train to level 4, please go in the green door. Level 4 players should select the blue door, and level 5 should go in the red door. There will be a fee charged for the training. Should you fail the the training session, you may come back later and try again.
